ygData.subject: Re: [_EQ_Magic] i want some e mails
ygData.msgSnippet: That s exactly what I was thinking. Whoever the moderator is better delete this child from the list, otherwise several of the rest of us our about to leave. We
ygData.messageBody:
That's exactly what I was thinking. Whoever the moderator is better delete
this child from the list, otherwise several of the rest of us our about to
leave. We aren't here for 'role-playing' games or to show off our newly
found naughty words. We're here to share the magic of entertaining people
and making them happy. If that's not your objective, it's time to leave.
Willy Stevens, get some friends in the real world, if you can, but you'll
first have to grow up.

Mindbender
puffasmoke@...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Michael Grundvig" <mike@...>
To: <_EQ_Magic@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, November 23, 2000 11:29 AM
Subject: Re: [_EQ_Magic] i want some e mails


> Ok, time for the list moderator to delete this guy. Several FCC and
egroups
> rules are broken with this last message and I am sure everyone on the list
> would appreciate having him removed.
>
> Mike
